articles.title: Intel Core i9 11900K and Core i5 11600K review: calm before the storm - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: The official Digital Foundry review of the AMD Ryzen 9 5950X and Ryzen 5 5600X, hosted by Eurogamer, including synthetic and gaming performance tests.
articles.content: It's finally here - Intel's 11th-generation of desktop CPUs. Codenamed Rocket Lake S, these chips aim to re-take the gaming performance crown from AMD, whose recently released Ryzen 5000 processors s… [+12170 chars]
